DOC.brief_summary: In context study retrospective data collection anaesthesia protocols child age 12 underwent surgery Charité - University Medicine Berlin , Campus Virchow - Klinikum year 2011 2012 shall execute . The correlation tracheal tube size weight , age height shall evaluate . This data collection serve reevaluate already publish formula e.g . ( Rettberg M. et al. , 2011 ) .
DOC.criteria: Children age 12 underwent surgery Charité University Medicine Berlin , Charité Campus Virchow Klinikum year 2011/12 No endotracheal tube insert
